history.proof: intros z z1 z2 H. intro Hz_neq_0. hauto use: Z.div_unique_exact.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall z z1 z2 : Z, Z.mul z z1 = Z.mul z z2 -> z <> 0 -> z1 = z2

Premises:
Inductive Z : Set := Z0 : Z | Zpos : positive -> Z | Zneg : positive -> Z Arguments Zpos _%positive_scope Arguments Zneg _%positive_scope
N.mul = fun n m : N => match n with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p => match m with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos q => N.pos (p * q) end end : N -> N -> N Arguments N.mul (_ _)%N_scope
sqr_0 : forall z : Z, z * z = 0 -> z = 0
sqr_poss : forall z : Z, 0 < z * z -> z <> 0
OMEGA5 : forall x y z : Z, x = 0 -> y = 0 -> x + y * z = 0
OMEGA6 : forall x y z : Z, 0 <= x -> y = 0 -> 0 <= x + y * z
Z.divide = fun x y : Z => exists z : Z, y = z * x : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.divide (_ _)%Z_scope
OMEGA17 : forall x y z : Z, Zne x 0 -> y = 0 -> Zne (x + y * z) 0
OMEGA20 : forall x y z : Z, Zne x 0 -> y = 0 -> Zne (x + y * z) 0
BinIntDef.Z.abs = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos p | Z.neg p => Z.pos p end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.abs _%Z_scope
BinIntDef.Z.sgn = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos _ => 1 | Z.neg _ => -1 end : Z -> Z Arguments BinIntDef.Z.sgn _%Z_scope
Z.mul_wd = Morphisms.reflexive_proper Z.mul : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq Z.eq)) Z.mul
Zdiv_rest_proofs_ind : forall (x : Z) (p : positive) (P : Zdiv_rest_proofs x p -> Prop), (forall (q r : Z) (e : x = q * two_power_pos p + r) (l : 0 <= r) (l0 : r < two_power_pos p), P (Zdiv_rest_proof x p q r e l l0)) -> forall z : Zdiv_rest_proofs x p, P z
Zdiv_rest_proofs_sind : forall (x : Z) (p : positive) (P : Zdiv_rest_proofs x p -> SProp), (forall (q r : Z) (e : x = q * two_power_pos p + r) (l : 0 <= r) (l0 : r < two_power_pos p), P (Zdiv_rest_proof x p q r e l l0)) -> forall z : Zdiv_rest_proofs x p, P z
Zdiv_rest_proofs_rect : forall (x : Z) (p : positive) (P : Zdiv_rest_proofs x p -> Type), (forall (q r : Z) (e : x = q * two_power_pos p + r) (l : 0 <= r) (l0 : r < two_power_pos p), P (Zdiv_rest_proof x p q r e l l0)) -> forall z : Zdiv_rest_proofs x p, P z
Zr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list Z) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr Z * Ring_polynom.PExpr Z)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr Z), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp eq (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l lpe ->...-> Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe1 = Ring_polynom.PEeval 0 1 Z.add Z.mul Z.sub Z.opp (IDphi (R:=Z)) Z.of_N Z.pow l pe2
fast_Zred_factor4 : forall (x y z : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (x * (y + z)) -> P (x * y + x * z)
Z.mul_eq_0_r : forall n m : Z, n * m = 0 -> n <> 0 -> m = 0
Z.eq_mul_0_r : forall n m : Z, n * m = 0 -> n <> 0 -> m = 0
Zmult_integral_l : forall n m : Z, n <> 0 -> m * n = 0 -> m = 0
Z.mul_eq_0_l : forall n m : Z, n * m = 0 -> m <> 0 -> n = 0
Z.eq_mul_0_l : forall n m : Z, n * m = 0 -> m <> 0 -> n = 0
Z.div_unique_exact : forall a b q : Z, b <> 0 -> a = b * q -> q = a / b
Z.mul_reg_r : forall n m p : Z, p <> 0 -> n * p = m * p -> n = m
Z.quot_unique_exact : forall a b q : Z, b <> 0 -> a = b * q -> q = a ÷ b
Z.mul_reg_l : forall n m p : Z, p <> 0 -> p * n = p * m -> n = m
Z_div_exact_full_2 : forall a b : Z, b <> 0 -> a mod b = 0 -> a = b * (a / b)

```coq
intros z z1 z2 H.
intro Hz_neq_0.
apply Z.mul_eq_0_r with z in H.
assumption.
intro H_z1_eq_z2.
rewrite <- H_z1_eq_z2 in H.
apply sqr_0 in H.
rewrite H in Hz_neq_0.
contradiction.
Qed.```

original: intros z z1 z2 H. intro Hz_neq_0. apply Z.mul_eq_0_r with z in H. auto. intro H_z1_eq_z2. rewrite <- H_z1_eq_z2 in H. apply sqr_0 in H. rewrite H in Hz_neq_0. contradiction.
